name: Oranienburger Kanal
description:
The Oranienburg canal, which gave this game its name, was built between 1832 and 1837 in Brandenburg.

Near the Oranienburg mills it was difficult to navigate the river. Therefore a canal was built from the Havel river, It crossed the older Ruppin canal, forming the Oranienburg canal cross.

During the industrialization in the 19th century lots of companies and businesses were formed at this important waterway Moreover, additional streets and railways were built.

In Oranienburger Kanal you erect new industries and shape the infrastructure. You´ll built pathways, streets, railways and canals.
Most important are bridges that connect buildings.

To do so you have access to various actions that you´ll select in the right moments.

At the end of the game the player with the best industrial area and the best infrastructure is the winner.

Oranienburger Kanal includes a solo game as well!

—description from the publisher
